comments: My man Mike. Wonderful experience at your class. I wish i taken more of his photo class before transfer. Trust me guys, take his class to push yourself. By the end, only you can create your style. He appreciate hard work, and will bash you for slacking.

comments: I\'ve known mike for a few years now. I\'ve taken him for photo 15,31,and 185. I loved mike for the fact that he will help you and that he will motivate you. Yes, he is stick in the beginning but he will open up after a while when you take more classes with him. He\'s very nice and caring he might look mad but i assure you he does take his job serious

comments: Life changing experience. Lots of inspirations and motivates you to become better. Do the work, get the credit. Don\'t be lazy in Mike\'s class. Don\'t expect an A if you don\'t want to shoot, simple as that.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Respected (3)  Inspirational (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He is one of the best instructors i had at LACC. He is very tough with assignments but he is only trying to make you a better photographer. He helpful and very approachable when you need help.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Respected (3)  Inspirational (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mike is a great professor! He may come off as strict at first but he\'s actually a pretty cool guy. Assignments are pretty easy and he gives a lot of examples! He lets you know what he likes and dislikes about your pictures and what you can improve on. This class was a lot of fun! Be prepare to take LOTS of pictures if you do take him!
